p: The title compound was prepared from the reaction of compound 15c (0.60 g, 2 mmol) with 4-fluorophenyl isocyanate (0.3 g, 2.2 mmol) according to the general procedure A. Compound 18c was obtained as white amorphous solid product, m.p. 261–3 °C, yield 75%.
